summary:
Rapeseed oil is made from the seeds of the Brassicaceae plant family. It's one of the oldest vegetable oils but was once only used industrially due to its high erucic acid content, which is harmful in large amounts. 

Canola oil is a special type with low erucic acid, making it safe to eat. It's made from specific rapeseed varieties and is regulated to contain less than 2% erucic acid. 

Rapeseed is grown worldwide, with Canada and Europe being major producers. The oil has various uses, from cooking to industry.
title: Rapeseed oil
